emptyState.title: No prompts yet
emptyState.description: Get started by creating your first prompt. Prompts help you set up consistent instructions for your AI conversations.

confirmDelete.title: Delete Prompt
confirmDelete.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{{title}}"? This action cannot be undone.

createDialog.title: Add New Prompt
createDialog.description: Create a new prompt template. Fill in the title and content below.

editDialog.title: Edit Prompt
editDialog.description: Make changes to your prompt here. Click save when you're done.
